attributes.action: Ban Sharia Law In The United Kingom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Ban Sharia Law in the United Kingdom.  Sharia Law is not an acceptable practice within our country. Your Government has sanctioned this law without any consultations being held with the people of the United Kingdom. There is one law in this country and one law only British Law. The implementation of Sharia Law in favour of the Islamic / Muslim minorities living within this country aids and adheres to their culture a culture British people will not live by. The British Government by allowing Sharia Courts to operate within the United Kingdom has placed its citizens in grave danger.

rejection.details: Sharia has no jurisdiction in England and Wales, and there is no intention for this to change. Muslim Arbitration Tribunals (MAT) are not courts. These bodies are a form of “alternative dispute resolution” (ADR). Participation in them is entirely voluntary.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
